question.title: Gradle build does not create licenseReport with jaredsburrows
question.body:
I want to create a licenseReport and display the information in my application, but when I run gradlew clean build, the generated file only contains an empty []. However, when I run gradlew clean licenseReport, the report includes all the information.

I am using:

id 'com.jaredsburrows.license' version '0.9.8' and Gradle 7.2.

My configuration:

licenseReport {
    generateHtmlReport = false
    generateJsonReport = true
    generateCsvReport = false
    generateTextReport = false
}

tasks.register('copyLicenseReport', Copy) {
    dependsOn 'licenseReport'
    from "$buildDirectory/reports/licenses"
    into "$buildDirectory/resources/main/licenses"
    include "licenseReport.json"
}

processResources.dependsOn tasks.named('copyLicenseReport')

I also tried downgrading the com.jaredsburrows.license plugin, but the result was the same.
